      • addScene

        protected void addScene​(int number,
                        YaegerScene scene)
        Add a YaegerScene to the YaegerStage.
        Parameters:
        number - The number as an int that identifies the YaegerScene. By calling the method setActiveScene(int) the added YaegerScene can be set as the active one.
        scene - The YaegerScene that should be added.
